item.text: Now because we are fellow workers, we also urge you not to receive the grace of God in vain.
For he says, “I heard you at the acceptable time, and in the day of salvation I helped you.” Look, now is the acceptable time; look, now is the day of salvation!

We do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">anyone</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="4349" class="">occasion for taking an offense</st> in <st data-num="4349" class="">anything</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3469" class="">fault</st> may be found with our <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1249">servants</st>,<n id="1" /> we have <st data-num="4921" class="">commended</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> way,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">persecutions</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="318" class="">difficulties</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4730" class="">distresses</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">beatings</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">imprisonments</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="181" class="">riots</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">troubles</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="70">sleepless nights</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3521" class="">hunger</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="54" class="">purity</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5544" class="">benevolence</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="505" class="">genuine</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truthful</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3056" class="">teaching</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3696" class="">weapons</st> of <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> both for the <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> for the <st data-num="710" class="">left</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="819" class="">dishonor</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1426" class="">slander</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2162">praise</st>; regarded <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4108" class="">impostors</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532">and</st> yet <st data-num="227" class="">true;</st>

<st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="50" class="">unknown</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="1921" class="">well-known;</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dying</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet—<st data-num="2400" class="">see</st>!—we continue to <st data-num="2198" class="">live;</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> those who are <st data-num="3811" class="">scourged</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2289" class="">executed;</st>
as sorrowful, but always rejoicing; as poor, but making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing everything.
We have spoken freely to you, Corinthians; our heart has been opened wide to you.

<st data-num="1473">Our</st> affection for you is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4729" class="">restricted</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> you are <st data-num="4729" class="">restricted</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4698" class="">affections</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.
Now as a fair exchange—I speak as to my children—open wide your hearts to us also.
Do not become partners with those who do not believe, for what partnership is there between righteousness and lawlessness, or what fellowship does light have with darkness?

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4857" class="">agreement</st> does <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> have <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="955" class="">Beliar</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> does a <st data-num="4103" class="">believer</st> <st data-num="3310">share in common</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> an <st data-num="571" class="">unbeliever</st>?

And what mutual agreement does the temple of God have with idols? For we are the temple of the living God, just as God said, “I will live in them and will walk among them, and I will be their God, and they will be my people.”
Therefore “come out from their midst, and be separate,” says the Lord, “and touch no unclean thing, and I will welcome you,
and I will be a father to you, and you will be my sons and daughters,” says the All-Powerful Lord.
